actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to exclude from social security taxes and coverage remuneration paid to certain youths during the first six months they are employed.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from coverage and from social security taxes remuneration paid to certain youths during the first six months of their employment in calendar years 1981 or 1982. Limits such exclusion to the cases of individuals properly designated: (1) economically disadvantaged youth; or (2) youth participating in a qualified cooperative education program.

titles.title: A bill to exclude from social security taxes and coverage remuneration paid to certain youths during the first six months they are employed.
